channel.title: Champion Scroll
channel.description: I recently got my first champion scroll from a lesser demon while doing a slayer task. Many of my rl friends, who are extremely high level in comparison to me [I am 92] have never gotten one, so I'm a bit fuzzy on the details to kill it. I know that I can only take inventory in, so I plan to cast spells at it, along with prayer and food. Does anyone know any good strategies for killing it?

item.title: Champion Scroll
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

goatee:

Melee it… it honestly isn’t even hard (like anything is in RS)

being able to say anything. without the censor blocking what you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Champion Scroll
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Yeah, it’s really just something people fabricate being that they’re so rare, and assume that you’ll never get one.

I’ve gotten 1, ever. I was all scared, and brought loads of prayer pots and restores. Best armor and all, and I didn’t really need more than a couple lobsters.

I was probably around level 70 combat at the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Champion Scroll
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Melee it… it honestly isn’t even hard (like anything is in RS)
